name: pigeonpod
description: Pigeon Pod is a self-hosted web app for tracking podcasts and episodes, offering tags, lists, and listening history for enthusiasts who want privacy and custom organization.
features: Podcast tracking: Subscribe to podcasts and track new episodes with automatic feed updates.
Episode management: Mark episodes as played, favorite, or queue them for later listening.
Custom tags: Organize podcasts with custom tags for flexible categorization beyond folders.
Listening history: Track which episodes you've listened to with timestamps and progress tracking.
Search functionality: Find podcasts and episodes by title, description, or custom metadata.
RSS feed support: Subscribe to any podcast using standard RSS or Atom feed URLs.
List creation: Create custom lists to organize podcasts by theme, priority, or listening schedule.
Privacy focused: Self-hosted solution keeps your listening habits and subscriptions private.
Import and export: Transfer podcast subscriptions using OPML format for backup or migration.
Web player: Stream episodes directly in the browser without downloading files.
Episode notes: Add personal notes and ratings to episodes for future reference.
Notification system: Get alerts when new episodes are available from subscribed podcasts.
